name: DUNGEON: Cradle of hell
description:
Immerse yourself in an exciting turn-based Roguelike adventure with RPG elements. Become a hero! Go through all hell, kill the devils and return home!
Will you be able to go all this way without going crazy?
Who knows?!


THERE ARE SCARY MONSTERS WAITING FOR YOU THE EXISTENCE OF WHICH YOU DID NOT EVEN SUSPECT:



MAGIC THAT EVEN HARRY POTTER HAS NOT HEARD OF:



AND OF COURSE THE LOOT YOU SIMPLY CAN'T COPY WITHOUT:



...AND DON'T SAY I DIDN'T WARN YOU!
